attributes.action: Atempt to help British Public Houses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prime Minister
Sir
In the current climate huge numbers of British public houses are suffering,This may be due to the recession in a small way and the smoking ban has not helped at all.
The large part is caused by the inflated prices charges by the pubcos on beer.
if we are to have a public house industrey left in the uk I urge you to put in place plans to stop this unfair practice as soon as is possable
